response.name: Get Latest Post

body.raw:
{
  "text": "UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves has delivered her Spring Statement in the Commons.
 
She said the 2025 growth estimate for the UK has been halved and set out her plan to deliver stability. In order to stick to her spending rules, Rachel Reeves announced cuts to welfare.
 
The government’s own analysis has shown they will leave more than three million families financially worse off but almost four million are expected to benefit.
 
The Conservatives called it an “emergency budget” and branded Rachel Reeves a “gambler”.
 
Tap the link in @BBCNews’s bio to find out what else was announced in the Spring Statement.
 
#BBCNews",
  "maxLength": 280
}
